game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Find the ancient temple and retrieve the treasure
game.description: A wealthy collector has hired you to find an ancient temple hidden deep in the jungle, where a valuable artifact is said to be hidden.
game.reward: Gold coins: 1000, Experience points: 500, Treasure map fragment: 1

task.objective: Speak to the local villager, Kanaq
task.description: Kanaq may have information about the temple's location.

task.objective: Navigate through the treacherous jungle terrain
task.description: The journey to the temple will be difficult, so you'll need to use your skills and equipment wisely.

task.objective: Solve the ancient puzzle to unlock the temple entrance
task.description: The temple's entrance is guarded by a complex puzzle. You'll need to use your wits and problem-solving skills to overcome it.
